project_preview_description.text: View NBA teams and players for the current season.

project_hero_image.alt: Hero image of NBA App Homepage. List of all teams in league.

project_description.text: This is a personal project that displays live NBA data for the current season. I used API calls from SportsData.io to get the current NBA stats. My goal for this project was to get more familiar with React. After working on this website, I learned a lot about the React framework and its many features.

project_description.alt: Image of team roster on NBA App.
